Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the authorization for imposition of additional sales and compensating use taxes in Greene county
Summary: Extends the authorization for imposition of additional sales and compensating use taxes in Greene county from November 30, 2020 to November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization for imposition of additional sales and compensating use taxes in Greene county
